sentences.english: But he still thinks that the loans are a good idea.
sentences.chinese: 但是，他仍然認爲進行貸款救助是一個好辦法。

sentences.english: Romania and Hungary are operating under I.M.F.
sentences.chinese: 羅馬尼亞和匈牙利正在接受國際貨幣基金組織的救助。

sentences.english: Aid to living according to our capability, step-by-step, and gradually increase.
sentences.chinese: 生活救助要量力而行，循序漸進，逐步提高。

sentences.english: The second chapter probes into the governmental educational salvage system.
sentences.chinese: 第二章探討國民政府的戰時教育救助體制。

sentences.english: The bailout will, in fact, solve several of G.M.’s biggest problems.
sentences.chinese: 實際上，這次的救助確實會解決通用的一些頑疾。

sentences.english: The reward shall not exceed the value of the ship and other property salved .
sentences.chinese: 本條規定不影響船舶所有人對其他被救助方的追償權。

sentences.english: Haudio-videoe you remarketing the study concerning the rescue of the hostaging?
sentences.chinese: 你看了關於救助人質的文章了嗎？

sentences.english: Sweden leads to the implementation of social assistance in the post-war policy ideas and practices.
sentences.chinese: 引出了瑞典在戰後實施社會救助政策的理念和做法。

sentences.english: Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac were bailed out by the government.
sentences.chinese: 範尼梅和雷德馬克已經得到政府的救助了。

sentences.english: The Red Cross administrates aid in disaster areas.
sentences.chinese: 紅十字會在災區實施救助。

sentences.english: We help the first child called Xia Qing.
sentences.chinese: 我們救助的第一個孩子叫夏青。

sentences.english: Taxpayers will likely lose more than $2,000,000,000 in federal rescue money.
sentences.chinese: 而納稅人將在聯邦救助資金裏損失超過20億美元。

sentences.english: Congress on Thursday granted smaller-scale relief by passing an extension of unemployment benefits.
sentences.chinese: 國會週四通過了延長失業救濟的小規模救助法案。

sentences.english: Haudio-videoe you read the written content in regards to the rescue of the hostage?
sentences.chinese: 你看了關於救助人質的文章了嗎？

sentences.english: The government didn't have enough foreign currency to bail out the banks.
sentences.chinese: 冰島政府也沒有足夠的外匯儲備可以用來救助銀行。

sentences.english: But its customers are resiliently campaigning to rescue and protect the Coffee House.
sentences.chinese: 但其客戶競相救助和保護咖啡屋。

definition: to provide critical care (to a patient or a diseased plant)
to rescue/to help out of difficulties/to save the situation
to take in and care for (an elderly person, a dog etc)/to adopt (a child)/adoption
to see what is right and act courageously (idiom, from Analects); to stand up bravely for the truth/acting heroically in a just cause
